components/common/search-form: {{{snippet 'forms_search'}}}
components/common/site-branding: {{# if settings.store_logo.image }} {{else}} {{settings.store_logo.title}} {{/if}}
components/header/account-button:
{{#if customer}}
account logout
{{else}} {{/if}}
components/header/header-top-bar-center-:
{{> components/common/search-form}}
{{> components/common/site-branding}}
{{> components/header/customer-utils}}
components/header/header-top-bar-left-al:
{{> components/common/site-branding}}
    {{> components/common/main-navigation-pages}}
{{settings.phone_number}}
{{> components/common/search-form}}
{{> components/header/customer-utils}}
components/header/header-top-bar-right-a:
{{> components/common/search-form}}
{{> components/header/customer-utils}}
{{> components/common/site-branding}}
components/mini-cart/mini-cart: {{> components/mini-cart/mini-cart-contents}}
components/mini-cart/mini-cart-contents:
{{#each cart.items}}
{{#if type '==' 'GiftCertificate'}} {{> svg/giftcard}} {{else}}
{{/if}}
{{name}} {{#if options}}
{{#each options}} {{value}} {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{price.formatted}} × {{quantity}}
{{/each}}
{{#if cart.items.length}} {{cart.quantity}}

{{lang 'mini_cart.subtotal'}} {{cart.sub_total.formatted}}

{{lang 'mini_cart.view_cart'}} {{lang 'mini_cart.checkout'}}
{{else}}

{{lang 'mini_cart.empty'}}

{{/if}}
